did.head: Descriptive Summary

userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Caleb Wilson Receipts, Manuscript MS 34.7, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Caleb Wilson was a resident of Norfolk, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Receipts, primarily between Wilson Butt and Caleb Wilson, but also with Nathaniel Wilson, and one issued by Edward Tabb. One receipt documents purchase of casks from Wilson Butt and Co.; others appear to be for Norfolk County, Va., property taxes.

did.unittitle: Receipt. Thomas Bull to Caleb Wilson, 8 August 1791.
Receipt. Wilson Butt to Nathaniel Wilson, 9 December 1791.
Receipt. Wilson Butt to Caleb Wilson, 5 August 1798.
Receipt for taxes. Wilson Butt, sheriff, to Caleb Wilson, 21 October 1798.
Receipt. Wilson Butt, sheriff, to Caleb Wilson, executor of Thomas Wilson, 1 October 1799.
Norfolk County tax receipt. Edward L. Tabb to Nathaniel Wilson. PFWMI, 7 December 1812.
